1377063621012901894.text: Gerrymandering is a practice as old as the republic that has become a science. Republicans have vowed to sharpen their pencils in NH and elsewhere to rig the maps. H.R. 1 would end partisan or discriminatory maps and establish independent commissions. 9/11

1377063620178235404.text: We’re also entering a redistricting year where political leaders will work to maximize every advantage possible at the expense of fair maps and competitive districts. 8/11

1377063617988820992.text: What we saw during pandemic voting in NH was a more flexible process that worked. Voters welcome the choice to vote safely from home. And despite being told for years by our SOS that mail in voting would somehow cheapen Election Day, we had a record turnout. 6/11

1319094933727399937.text: This is what I’ll remain focused on for the next thirteen days, and I invite Mr. Mowers to do the same.

1319094932825640960.text: While Mr. Mowers was focused on leveling baseless attacks against me and misrepresenting my record I spoke about specific ways we can help Granite Staters by passing a new COVID-19 relief package, protecting affordable health care, and bringing our economy back from the brink.

1319094932053893122.text: I’ll continue working to bring people together around solutions and move New Hampshire forward.

1319094931189862402.text: We are the midst of a national crisis right now with the COVID-19 pandemic, and what is most important is that we have a substantive discussion so that the voters can learn where we stand on the issues.

1319094930392928259.text: New Hampshire voters saw gutter politics at their worst tonight, but true Granite Staters know that hate has no place in our state. I hope that we can keep this campaign above board moving forward.

1319094929491099650.text: Members of the LGBTQ+ community have always been held to a different standard when running for office and Mr. Mowers’s baseless attacks perpetuate those same harmful lines of attack.

1103322006962012160.text:
#HR1, the #ForThePeople Act, will🤝end the culture of corruption🤝. How?
✅Stop Congress from corp. board membership
✅No taxpayer-funded discrimination settlements
✅Require 10 yrs of presidential tax returns
✅Close foreign agent/lobbyist loopholes
✅Strengthen @OfficeGovEthics

1103322004084658176.text:
#HR1, the #ForThePeople Act, will help 💸fix our broken campaign finance system💸. How?
✅Ban foreign money
✅Ensure online political ad disclosure
✅Require political orgs to disclose big donors
✅Incentivize small-dollar donors
✅Restructure the Federal Election Commission

1103322002708938758.text:
#HR1, the #ForThePeople Act, will 🗳️protect and expand voting access🗳️. How?
✅Automatic voter registration
✅Expand early voting & voting hours
✅Fund election protection infrastructure
✅Stop voter roll purges
✅Restore voting rights for felons who have served their sentence

565955038111997953.text: Excellent budget address by @GovernorHassan, outlining key priorities that will move our state forward #nhpolitics http://t.co/bocT8v3F0V

565950053618311168.text: Young people need affordable education and modern transportation options. We need to focus on both issues to attract new talent and keep it.

565946699794116608.text: Commuter rail is vital to putting our economy on the fast track, and I support the Governor's efforts to move this project forward.

565946242493325313.text: A modern transportation infrastructure is vital to growing our economy and bring in new people and business

565896699529666560.text: @drewgrosvenor My pleasure. It was great speaking with the group!

565163060563038208.text: We have a tough budget year in NH, as we always do, but we have to seize this opportunity. We are #ReadyforRail and need a commonsense plan.

565162415525216257.text: Demand for rail is there, and ridership on the Downeaster is going up. The seacoast and the Capitol Corridor are #ReadyforRail

565161841429856256.text: We can creatively engage the private sector to help finance and operate passenger rail.

565161145393500161.text: A guest correctly notes that we used to have an extensive rail network, but we let it decay.

565160090823843840.text: We need an all-of-above transportation solution: we can walk and chew gum at the same time #ReadyforRail

565159878692708353.text: Trains are faster and more reliable than buses. They will reduce congestion and emissions. #ReadyforRail

565159450131312641.text: Support for rail is strong, and if legislators listen to their constituents and local businesses, they will hear that NH is #ReadyforRail.

565159052481929216.text: Downeaster ridership is going up, and helping grow downtown Dover http://t.co/HjMNp4LCN1

565157199820107776.text: Massachusetts and and the federal government are very excited about this rail project. It's best opportunity for expanding rail anywhere.

565156115294744576.text: Rail makes NH a more attractive option, especially for younger people.
